Our AI Analysis Methodology

Our AI processes thousands of Amazon customer reviews using advanced natural language processing (NLP). We extract sentiment on key attributes like efficacy, texture, absorption, value, and long-term results. Products are scored based on verified purchase reviews, weighted by recency and reviewer credibility. Only products with 1,500+ reviews qualify for top spots.

Buying Guide

Lips have no oil glands and thinner skin than the rest of your face, making them uniquely vulnerable to dryness, cracking, and sun damage. Good lip care goes beyond basic chapstick.

Quick Tips

  • üí° Look for lip balms with occlusive ingredients (beeswax, shea butter, petrolatum)
  • üí° SPF lip protection is often overlooked ‚Äî lips get sunburned too
  • üí° Lip scrubs should be gentle ‚Äî sugar-based is better than salt-based
  • üí° Avoid lip products with menthol or camphor ‚Äî they feel cooling but actually dry lips out
